name: Street Cat Girls Fight!
description:
Victoria wakes up one day to discover her home in RUINS! In rage, she seeks revenge!!

Submission for the A Game By Its Cover Game Jam, based on this cover. This is just a demo to test out the game mechanics I wanted to implement. Since it worked out, I might very well end up making a full version of the game later. My goal would be to eventualy replace all default assets, develop the story and the other characters I have in mind, and many, many different endings with ending illustrations.
